text: Airplane! is an American parody comedy movie made in 1980. It was written and directed by David Zucker, Jerry Zucker, and Jim Abrahams. It is a parody of the 1970 movie Airport as well as the 1957 movie Zero Hour!. It is was picked as the 6th most funny movie in Bravo's '100 Funniest Movies'. In 2007, people in the United Kingdom voted Airplane! was the second greatest comedy ever made. In 2010, Airplane! was added by the Library of Congress to the United States National Film Registry since it was important to the American culture and movie history. == References == Category:1980 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Abrahams Category:Movies directed by David Zucker Category:Movies directed by Jerry Zucker Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Airplane!
